thread.title: BRIEF-Vivendi Says Digital Services At Music Division Grew By More Than 30 Percent In Q1-CEO

title: BRIEF-Vivendi Says Digital Services At Music Division Grew By More Than 30 Percent In Q1-CEO
text:
April 19, 2018 / 9:41 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Vivendi Says Digital Services At Music Division Grew By More Than 30 Percent In Q1-CEO Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 19 (Reuters) - Vivendi SA: 
* VIVENDI CEO DE PUYFONTAINE SAYS DIGITAL SERVICES AT MUSIC DIVISION UNIVERSAL MUSIC GROUP (UMG), WHICH INCLUDE SUBSCRIPTION, STREAMING AND DOWNLOADS, GREW BY MORE THAN 30 PERCENT IN Q1 
* VIVENDIâ€™S PAY-TV UNIT CANAL PLUS TO ANNOUNCE ADDITIONAL DISTRIBUTION DEAL WITH APPLE NEXT WEEK, HEAD OF DISTRIBUTION FRANK CADORET SAYS Further company coverage: (Reporting by Mathieu Rosemain)
